Body.Content:
We are announcing the ability to enable 3rd-party providers to build and publish agent-ready connectors for Microsoft Copilot Studio in Partner Center for Power Platform. This feature will reach general availability on November 15, 2025.

How does this affect me?
This feature allows independent software vendors (ISVs) to develop a low-code AI ecosystem containing Power Platform connectors that can be extended with Copilot agents and flow templates for various business scenarios. By certifying and publishing Agent ready connectors in Partner Center, makers can:
  • Obtain a 99% certification efficiency gain. Certification time is reduced from 40 days to 48 hours.
  • Experience 100% automated partner vetting, ensuring the authenticity of independent software vendors (ISVs) and partners through OneVet on Partner Center.
  • Access 180 unique connector and connector template offers from ISVs.
What action do I need to take?
This message is for awareness, and no action is required.

If you would like more information on this feature, please visit Enable 3rd-party providers to build and publish agent-ready connectors.
